title: 2010/129/CFSP: Council Decision 2010/129/CFSP of 1 March 2010 amending Common Position 2008/109/CFSP concerning restrictive measures imposed against Liberia
header:
2.3.2010 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 51/23
COUNCIL DECISION 2010/129/CFSP
of 1 March 2010
amending Common Position 2008/109/CFSP concerning restrictive measures imposed against Liberia
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article 29 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) On 12 February 2008, the Council adopted Common Position 2008/109/CFSP concerning restrictive measures against Liberia (1).
(2) On 17 December 2009, the United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution (UNSCR) 1903 (2009) renewing the restrictive measures on travel for a further period of 12 months and amending the restrictive measures on arms.
(3) Common Position 2008/109/CFSP should be amended accordingly.
(4) Further action by the Union is needed in order to implement certain of these measures,
main_body: This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 March 2010.
For the Council
The President
D. LÓPEZ GARRIDO
(1)  OJ L 38, 13.2.2008, p. 26.
(2)  OJ L 335, 13.12.2008, p. 99.’
